title: Realme GT Neo 3 (150W) Review: Once you fast-charge, you can never go back
content:
When you talk about fast charging on a smartphone, a good chunk of the world still experiences it at a maximum of 18W-25W, thanks to Apple, Samsung, and the budget market sticking to these numbers. Move over to Asia though, and you’d find that even 25W barely qualifies as what one can consider fast charging.

The post Realme GT Neo 3 (150W) Review: Once you fast-charge, you can never go back appeared first on XDA.
description: The Realme GT Neo 3 in its 150W flavor charges really fast. We put the company's claims to the test in this review. Check it out!
